headline.main: In Mexico City, A Nouveau Slice Of European Cool

docs.lead_paragraph: The Condesa DF, a new 40-room hotel designed by the Parisian interior architect India Mahdavi, is located in the heart of Mexico City's Condesa district, a neighborhood of tree-lined streets and Art Nouveau buildings that house some of the most fashionable galleries and cafes in the city. ''I wanted the design to reflect a strong Mexico City identity with a European touch,'' said Ms. Mahdavi.
